<style type="text/css" media="screen, print">

	/***
	Body
	***/

	body,
	.site-content {
		background-color: #ffffff;
	}

	.block > .wrap,
	.site-content > .wrap,
	.thumbnail .title--caps {
		background-color: #ffffff;
	}

	.package--top__synopsis .signup { border-color: #ffffff; }

	/*****
	Header
	*****/

	.site-header { background-color: #ffffff; }

	/* Header > Datestamp / Verticals */
	.verticals__wrap { border-color: #eeeeee; }

	.datestamp,
	.verticals a,
	.verticals__btn {
		color: #333333;
	}

	/* Header > Search bar */
	.search-form--header {
		border-color: #eeeeee;
		background-color: transparent;
	}

	.search-form--header .search-form__text,
	.search-form--header .search-form__submit {
		color: #555555;
	}

	/*****
	Footer
	------
	* Putting this CSS here for first-load visibility.
	*****/

	.site-footer {
		background-color: #555 !important;
		color: #fff;
	}

	/*********
	Navigation
	*********/

	/* Navigation > Tabs */
	.nav-bar > .menu-item > a { color: #000000; }

	/* Navigation > Show Tabs */
	.show-tabs .nav-bar .sub-menu {
		background-color: #ffffff;
	}

	.show-tabs .nav-bar > .menu-item > a { background-color: #ffffff; }
	.show-tabs .all-sections-btn { background-color: #ffffff; }

	/* Navigation > Hide Tabs */
	.hide-tabs .nav-bar .sub-menu { background-color: #ffffff; }

	.hide-tabs .current_page_item,
	.hide-tabs .menu-item-type-taxonomy.current-menu-item,
	.hide-tabs .menu-item-type-taxonomy.current-menu-parent,
	.hide-tabs .menu-item-type-taxonomy.current-post-ancestor,
	.hide-tabs .menu-item-type-taxonomy.current-fp-ancestor {
		border-color: #003e73;
	}

	.hide-tabs .nav-bar .sub-menu { border-color: #eeeeee; }

	/* Navigation > Buttons */
	.header-btn,
	.all-sections-btn,
	.nav-bar .sub-menu a {
		color: #000000;
	}

	/* Navigation > Pager */
	.pagination .current { background-color: #0066b3; }

	/*****
	Blocks
	*****/

	/* Blocks > Carousel Block */
	.block--carousel .title--block__link { color: #003e73; }

	
	/* Blocks > News Block */
	.block--feature .category-label,
	.block--grid .category-label {
		padding-left: 10px;
		background-color: #003e73;
		color: #ffffff;
	}

	.block--feature .post--feature,
	.block--grid .post--grid {
		background-color: #003e73;
	}

	.block--feature .synopsis {
		padding-left: 10px;
		padding-right: 10px;
		padding-bottom: 10px;
	}

	.block--feature .post--feature .title,
	.block--grid .post--grid .title {
		margin-left: 10px;
		margin-right: 10px;
	}

	.block--grid .post--grid .title { min-height: 80px; }

	.block--feature .post--feature .title,
	.block--feature .synopsis,
	.block--grid .category-label,
	.block--grid .timestamp,
	.block--grid .post--grid .title,
	.block--grid .synopsis {
		color: #ffffff;
	}

	.block--news .timestamp,
	.block--grid .timestamp {
		border-color: rgba(255,255,255,0.2);
	}

	
	/* Blocks > Gallery Block */
	.gallery__page.js-pager-active {
		background-color: #0066b3;
		color: #ffffff;
	}

	.gallery__page.js-pager-active:before { color: #0066b3; }
	.gallery__thumbs::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb { background-color: #0066b3; }

	.gallery__thumbs::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb:window-inactive {
		background-color: #0066b3;
		background-color: rgba(0,102,179,0.6);
	}

	/* Blocks > Carousel Block */
	.carousel__ui {
		background-color: #0066b3;
		color: #ffffff;
	}

	/*****
	Author
	*****/

	.author__meta-link:hover { color: #0066b3; }

	/*****
	Embeds
	*****/

	.image-gallery__control:hover { background-color: #0066b3; }

	/***
	CTAs
	***/
